title: Exchange of Messages With Prime Minister James Ramsay MacDonald of Great Britain.
text:
AS YOU near the shores of the United States I send to you a most cordial welcome not only in my own name but on behalf of my fellow countrymen as well.

HERBERT HOOVER
garbage_collected: [The Right Honorable James Ramsay MacDonald, M.P., Prime Minister of Great Britain, S. S. Berengaria]
